field.description: The config field this warning is for in a JSON pointer format.

ConfigWarning.description: A warning for a configuration field.

state.description: The user's relationship to the group.

id.description: A device identifier. Should be obtained by a platform-specific device API.

vars.description: Extra information that will be bundled in the session token.

apiAccountDevice.description: Send a device to the server. Used with authenticate/link/unlink and user.

channelId.description: The channel this message belongs to.

messageId.description: The unique ID of this message.

code.description: The code representing a message type or category.

senderId.description: Message sender, usually a user ID.

username.description: The username of the message sender, if any.

createTime.description: The UNIX time when the message was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time when the message was last updated.

persistent.description: True if the message was persisted to the channel's history, false otherwise.

roomName.description: The name of the chat room, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a chat room.

groupId.description: The ID of the group, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a group channel.

userIdOne.description: The ID of the first DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

userIdTwo.description: The ID of the second DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

apiChannelMessage.description: A message sent on a channel.

updateTime.description: Time of the latest relationship update.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

apiFriendList.description: A collection of zero or more friends of the user.

creatorId.description: The id of the user who created the group.

name.description: The unique name of the group.

langTag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

avatarUrl.description: A URL for an avatar image.

open.description: Anyone can join open groups, otherwise only admins can accept members.

edgeCount.description: The current count of all members in the group.

maxCount.description: The maximum number of members allowed.

createTime.description: The UNIX time when the group was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time when the group was last updated.

leaderboardId.description: The ID of the leaderboard this score belongs to.

ownerId.description: The ID of the score owner, usually a user or group.

username.description: The username of the score owner, if the owner is a user.

numScore.description: The number of submissions to this score record.

createTime.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard record was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard record was updated.

expiryTime.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard record expires.

maxNumScore.description: The maximum number of score updates allowed by the owner.

apiLeaderboardRecord.description: Represents a complete leaderboard record with all scores and associated metadata.

content.description: Content of the notification in JSON.

senderId.description: ID of the sender, if a user. Otherwise 'null'.

createTime.description: The UNIX time when the notification was created.

persistent.description: True if this notification was persisted to the database.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

userId.description: The user owner of the object.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

permissionRead.description: The read access permissions for the object.

permissionWrite.description: The write access permissions for the object.

createTime.description: The UNIX time when the object was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time when the object was last updated.

apiStorageObject.description: An object within the storage engine.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

apiUserGroupList.description: A list of groups belonging to a user, along with the user's role in each group.

consoleAccountExport.description: An export of all information stored for a user account.

consoleAuthenticateRequest.description: Authenticate a console user with username and password.

warnings.description: Any warnings about the current config.

consoleConfig.description: The current server configuration and any associated warnings.

token.description: A session token (JWT) for the console user.

nodes.description: List of nodes and their stats.

consoleStatusList.description: List of nodes and their stats.

matchCount.description: Current number of active authoritative matches.

avgRateSec.description: Average number of requests per second.

consoleStatusListStatus.description: The status of a Nakama node.

objects.description: List of storage objects matching list/filter operation.

totalCount.description: Approximate total number of storage objects.

consoleUnlinkDeviceRequest.description: Unlink a particular device ID from a user's account.

id.description: The identifier of this wallet change.

userId.description: The user ID this wallet ledger item belongs to.

createTime.description: The UNIX time when the wallet ledger item was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time when the wallet ledger item was updated.

consoleWalletLedger.description: An individual update to a user's wallet.

items.description: A list of wallet ledger items.

consoleWalletLedgerList.description: List of wallet ledger items for a particular user.

consoleWriteStorageObjectRequest.description: Write a new storage object or update an existing one.

email.description: The email address of the user.

devices.description: The devices which belong to the user's account.

customId.description: The custom id in the user's account.

verifyTime.description: The UNIX time when the user's email was verified.

disableTime.description: The UNIX time when the user's account was disabled/banned.

nakamaapiAccount.description: A user with additional account details. Always the current user.

id.description: The id of the user's account.

username.description: The username of the user's account.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

avatarUrl.description: A URL for an avatar image.

langTag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

location.description: The location set by the user.

timezone.description: The timezone set by the user.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

facebookId.description: The Facebook id in the user's account.

googleId.description: The Google id in the user's account.

gamecenterId.description: The Apple Game Center in of the user's account.

steamId.description: The Steam id in the user's account.

online.description: Indicates whether the user is currently online.

edgeCount.description: Number of related edges to this user.

createTime.description: The UNIX time when the user was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time when the user was last updated.

facebookInstantGameId.description: The Facebook Instant Game ID in the user's account.

appleId.description: The Apple Sign In ID in the user's account.

disableTime.description: The UNIX time when the account was disabled.
